column4: When I run Ubuntu with Gnome, Wicd can connect to the wireless, but when I run Ubuntu with Awesome, Wicd can only do wired. When I try to connect to my wireless network, it says "linksys: Obtaining IP address..." for a while while and then it says "Connection failed: unable to get IP address". Any ideas?
well, what's gnome loading that awesome/(your xinitrc) isn't loading?
your welcome, glad i could help
